text: Anita Falieros is an Australian former taekwondo martial artist. She competed at the 1992 Summer Olympics, where taekwondo was a demonstration sport, in the flyweight event. At the 1987 World Taekwondo Championships she won the bronze medal in the -47 kg category. She won at the European Taekwondo Championships the silver medal in 1990 and the bronze medal in 1992. == References == Category:1976 births Category:Taekwondo practitioners Category:Australian martial artists Category:Living people
title: Anita Falieros
